sentence.Network_en: A small, slender European dove ( Streptopelia turtle ) having a white - edged tail and a soft, purring voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 斑鸠一种产于欧洲的体型纤细而小的鸠鸽 ( 欧斑鸠 ),尾羽有白边, 鸣声轻柔哀怨.
